comprehensive_overview: NLopt is an open-source library for nonlinear optimization that provides a common interface for a number of different optimization algorithms. It is written in C with wrappers for several other programming languages.
core_features: NLopt offers many different algorithms for nonlinear optimization, including local derivative-free, local gradient-based, and global optimization algorithms. It allows for easy switching between different algorithms and supports both unconstrained and constrained optimization problems.
